A fun miltiplayer shooter with a nice single player mode
the mechanics are nice and robust with the only difficulty being my own skill (which is awful btw)
and the bots are nice and responsive for that single player action

although it has became obsolete by CS:GO because CS:GO is free to play and has substantially better mechanics, CS:GO on the other hand has worse single player content while the multiplayer mode is better supported.

If you're looking for a single player CS experience, buy this game or CounterStrike Source
